sections.text:
49-233.Constitutional convention; preliminary survey committee; expenses.

The members of the preliminary survey committee shall be paid expenses while engaged in the duties provided for by section 49-232 as provided in sections 81-1174 to 81-1177.

SourceLaws 1953, c. 173, ยง 22, p. 553;Laws 1981, LB 204, ยง 86;Laws 2020, LB381, ยง 40.
